H0.text: What is the word for a pile of rocks that marks a hiking trail. Monument

H1.text: What is the word for a pile of rocks that marks a hiking trail. Marker

H2.text: What is the word for a pile of rocks that marks a hiking trail. Pylon

H3.text: What is the word for a pile of rocks that marks a hiking trail. Cairn

A4.text: Cairns can be used to mark hiking trails, especially in mountain regions at or above the tree line.
